member.name: P:Discord.WebSocket.DiscordSocketConfig.GatewayHost
member.summary: Gets or sets the websocket host to connect to. If null, the client will use the /gateway endpoint.

member.name: P:Discord.WebSocket.DiscordSocketConfig.ConnectionTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the time, in milliseconds, to wait for a connection to complete before aborting.

member.name: P:Discord.WebSocket.DiscordSocketConfig.ShardId
member.summary: Gets or sets the id for this shard. Must be less than TotalShards.

member.name: P:Discord.WebSocket.DiscordSocketConfig.TotalShards
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of shards for this application.

member.name: P:Discord.WebSocket.DiscordSocketConfig.MessageCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of messages per channel that should be kept in cache. Setting this to zero disables the message cache entirely.

member.name: P:Discord.WebSocket.DiscordSocketConfig.LargeThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the max number of users a guild may have for offline users to be included in the READY packet. Max is 250.

member.name: P:Discord.WebSocket.DiscordSocketConfig.AudioMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of audio this DiscordClient supports.

member.summary: Gets or sets the provider used to generate new websocket connections.

member.summary: Gets or sets the provider used to generate new udp sockets.

member.name: P:Discord.WebSocket.DiscordSocketConfig.AlwaysDownloadUsers
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not all users should be downloaded as guilds come available.

member.name: P:Discord.WebSocket.SocketGuildUser.Hierarchy
member.summary: The position of the user within the role hirearchy.
member.remarks: The returned value equal to the position of the highest role the user has, or int.MaxValue if user is the server owner.
